# symbolVariant(_:)

**Type Method**

Applies the specified symbol variant when selected.

## Declaration

```swift
static func symbolVariant(_ variant: SymbolVariants) -> PaletteSelectionEffect
```

## Discussion



## Getting palette selection effects

- **automatic**: Applies the system’s default effect when selected.
- **custom**: Does not apply any system effect when selected.
